javadoc:
Defines the interface for an object containing the state
 of all processor registers relative to a specific address.

methods.javadoc:
@return the base processor context register or null if one
 has not been defined
methods.name: getBaseContextRegister

return.comment:
the base processor context register or null if one
 has not been defined

methods.javadoc:
Returns all the Registers for the processor
@return all the Registers for the processor
methods.name: getRegisters
methods.comment: Returns all the Registers for the processor

return.comment: all the Registers for the processor

methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment: Get a Register given the name of a register

return.comment: The register with the given name.

methods.name: getValue
methods.comment: Get the contents of a processor register as a BigInteger object

params.name: register
params.comment: register to get the value for

return.comment:
a BigInteger object containing the value of the register if a value exists,
 otherwise null.

methods.name: getRegisterValue
methods.comment: Get the RegisterValue for the given register.

params.name: register
params.comment: register to get the value for

return.comment:
RegisterValue object containing the value of the register if a value exists,
 otherwise null.

methods.name: hasValue
methods.comment: Returns true if a value is defined for the given register.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register to check for a value.

return.comment: true if the given register has a value.

name: ProcessorContextView
comment:
Defines the interface for an object containing the state
 of all processor registers relative to a specific address.
